code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserSwitcher=_ref=>{let{users,currentUser,openInbox,notifications}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center mb-3",children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:`btn mx-2 ${currentUser===user?"btn-primary":"btn-secondary"}`,onClick:()=>openInbox(user),children:[user," ",notifications[user]>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-danger",children:notifications[user]})]},user))});};export default UserSwitcher;
